short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dark mode extension for connect.garmin.com that replaces light colors with their dark theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension which changes apperance of Garmin Connect website to dark theme. Finally you can stop being blinded by the site! 

Preserves the original color scheme of charts and key page elements. The extension only affects connect.garmin.com, other pages remain unaffected. Extension changes even the smallest details!
